alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 12 at 3:07PM PST until March 12 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of the Curry County coast, including Pistol River, Gold Beach, and much of the US 101 corridor. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds can blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
